DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study confirm efficacy olanzapine treatment manic mixed symptom associate bipolar I disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Olanzapine Patients With Manic Mixed Episode Bipolar I Disorder
DOC.criteria: Meet criterion manic mix episode accord Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders Fourth Edition , Text Revision ( DSMIVTR ) diagnosis `` 294.4x Bipolar I Disorder , Most Recent Episode Manic '' `` 296.6x Bipolar I Disorder , Most Recent Episode Mixed '' . Have total score Young Mania Rating Scale ( YMRS ) least 20 Visit 1 Visit 2 . Have receive antidepressant psychostimulant within 5 day prior Visit 1 . The duration current episode 90 day Visit 1 . Have history diagnosis diabetes mellitus . Have receive psychotropic medication within 2 day prior Visit 2 ( except benzodiazepine ) .
DOC.keyword: Manic mixed episode associate bipolar I disorder
